hero.gae1:
Cuairteoir ag lorg ór is dócha? 
Sín do lámh isteach san uisce...
hero.eng1:
A visitor seeking gold probably? 
Reach your hand into the water...
hero.gae2:
...ní shínfaidh?
 Ach féach an lionra atá ar!
hero.eng2:
...you won't?
 But see how it shines!
hero.eng3:
Not gold?
knowledge is what you seek then
hero.gae3:
Ní ór?
feasa atá á lorg agat mar sin
hero.eng4:
You'll find torches 
at the back of the cave
hero.gae4:
Aimseoidh tú tóirsí 
ag cúl an plúais
